title: Bug 13725: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
description: Bug 13725: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
OB: When trying to revert a file in the java editor, it takes significantly longer compared to closing and reopening the file.
EB: This seems odd, since reverting the file contents should not take more time than closing and reopening the file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a file in the java editor. 
2. Make some changes to the file. 
3. Try to revert the file using the revert option. 
4. Observe that reverting the file takes longer than expected. 
5. Close the file and reopen it. 
6. Observe that closing and reopening the file is faster than reverting it.
